channel.title: Getting Started on
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on

item.title: Pulling and Building RKVST Docs
item.description: To begin pull the latest RKVST docs from Github. git clone git@github.com:jitsuin-inc/rkvst-docs.git Move into the directory. cd rkvst-doks Install the DOKS Dependencies. npm install Note: If you do not have npm installed please use the following guide: Ubuntu Cent OS/RHEL MacOS apt install npm yum install npm brew install npm 4. To run a local RKVST Docs Server it is advisable to use the jitsuin-doks wrapper
